This is an explanation of how to play Fishing|Battle! Pull the hook before the lure's bite|level drops to zero to pull the fish to|
|shore! You can only use a limited number of|fishing tricks in one fishing battle, such as|loosening the hook and pulling as hard as you|
|can. Find the right time to use them and|catch the fish!
